title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.6 - Solicitation of funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.6 - Solicitation of funds

State Regulations

No child care agency shall require or permit any child in
its care to solicit funds for the agency or any of its programs, or permit any
such child to be identified by name in any solicitation
literature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
441.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
